Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.color

Class ColorMyShelfieAttribute

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.color.MyShelfieAttribute
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.color.ColorMyShelfieAttribute
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackColorMyShelfieAttribute, TextColorMyShelfieAttribute
abstract class ColorMyShelfieAttribute extends MyShelfieAttribute
An abstract class representing a colored attribute in MyShelfie. Extends the MyShelfieAttribute class.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColorMyShelfieAttribute

      ColorMyShelfieAttribute(int r, int g, int b)
      Constructor (true-color).
      Parameters:
      r - A number (0-255) that represents the red component.
      g - A number (0-255) that represents the green component.
      b - A number (0-255) that represents the blue component.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the color components is not within the range [0-255].

  • Method Details

    • isTrueColor

      protected boolean isTrueColor()
      Checks if the color is a true-color.
      Returns:
      true if the color is a true-color, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the colored attribute. The string includes the ANSI prefix and ANSI code for the color.
